scripts.start:python: cp .cdsrc-private.json srv-python/ && cd srv-python && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pwd && cds bind --exec -- venv/bin/uvicorn api:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8080
scripts.install:python:dependencies: cd srv-python && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.build:docker:hana-deployer: pack build gregorwolf/cap-python-hana-deployer --path gen/db --buildpack gcr.io/paketo-buildpacks/nodejs --builder paketobuildpacks/builder-jammy-base --env BP_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=""
scripts.build:docker:cap: pack build gregorwolf/cap-python-srv-cap --path gen/srv --buildpack gcr.io/paketo-buildpacks/nodejs --builder paketobuildpacks/builder-jammy-base --env BP_NODE_RUN_SCRIPTS=""
scripts.build:docker:python: cd srv-python && docker buildx build --platform=linux/amd64 -t gregorwolf/cap-python-srv-python:latest .
